item.title: [GRA/UK/WAW/DE][Public Cloud] - API
item.description:
Feb 23, 12:53 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 23/02/2023 08:00 UTC
End Time : 23/02/2023 08:40 UTC
Root cause : The incident is due to the following incident: https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/yg0z378c47dg
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 23, 09:22 UTC
Monitoring - Update : Our teams have corrected the problem, but the identification of the root cause is still in progress.
We are keeping the incident under surveillance until the root cause is identified.

Feb 23, 08:43 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/02/2023 08:00 UTC
Service impact : All API call for GRA, UK, WAW and DE region are not answering. Creation, modification and deletion of cloud ressources in GRA and UK region are not possible.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [EU/CA][Customer Panel][Order funnel][API][corporate websites] - TLSv1.0 and TLSv1.1 End of Life
item.description:
Feb 15, 10:36 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 15, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 1, 01:39 UTC
Update - The scope has been broadened.
The components affected are now also in Canada.

Jan 30, 23:14 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/02/2023 00:00 UTC
End time : 15/02/2023 23:59 UTC
Service impact : Customers using outdated OS or browsers with only TLSv1.0 and TLSv1.1 capability will no longer be able to reach our commercial website and the customer panel.
Service improvement : On Wednesday February 15th 2023, OVHcloud will change the TLS configuration of its corporate websites endpoints and customer panel. This
change is performed to stick with industry security standards, we recommend that you upgrade your OS and browser to make sure you use at least TLSv1.2.

item.title: [Global][API] - Api instabilities
item.description:
Feb 6, 15:59 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 06/02/2023 10:53 UTC
End Time : 06/02/2023 11:30 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 6, 11:46 UTC
Monitoring - No more instabilities are reported.
We are monitoring the situation the time being for further investigation.

Feb 6, 11:26 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 06/02/2023 10:53 UTC
Service impact : Customer panel or users of api.ovh.com might have slowness or errors while browsing.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
We have detected a raise of errors on api.ovh.com and the customer panel. Our team are working to restore the service
Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Support] - Phone number
item.description:
Feb 5, 01:09 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 04/02/2023 19:20 UTC
End Time : 04/02/2023 21:45 UTC
Root cause : Incident was caused by a software issue.
Our technical teams resolved the incident.
All services are operational.

Feb 4, 22:05 UTC
Monitoring - The support is reachable since 21:45 UTC, we keep the task under monitoring until 01:00 UTC for more precautions.

Feb 4, 21:23 UTC
Update - Our teams are continuing to investigate the issue. An internal escalation has been made to assist with the investigation.
An update will be posted as soon as any significant progress is made.

Feb 4, 19:58 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 04/02/2023 19:20 UTC
Service impact : Customers aren't able to contact the support by phone.
However, the support is still reachable using tickets.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem.
